data.name: strBoolModeStateOffDesc
data.value: Off

data.name: strBoolModeStateOnDesc
data.value: On

data.name: strChanServOptAtTheme
data.value: AtTheme

data.name: strChanServOptAtThemeToolTip
data.value: ChanServ is implemented by AtTheme. Only select this if you're sure that's what they use.

data.name: strChanServOptNull
data.value: None available

data.name: strChanServOptNullToolTip
data.value: Select this if the network doesn't have ChanServ

data.name: strChanServOptUnknown
data.value: Available, but type unknown

data.name: strChanServOptUnknownToolTip
data.value: Select this if the network has a ChanServ, but you don't know much about it

data.name: strDefChanModeForwardDesc
data.value: join throttling to be sent to another channel.

data.name: strDefChanModeForwardDestParamDesc
data.value: Enter the name of the channel you want the forward to go to.

data.name: strDefChanModeForwardDetParamName
data.value: Destination

data.name: strDefChanModeInviteOnlyDesc
data.value: This mode causes the channel to be invite only. People must get an invite via either the ChanServ/Q's invite function or the |/invite| command.
data.comment: Note: The text in pipes will be formatted at runtime as fixed with. Also, don't translate text in pipes as they're always special.

data.name: strDefChanModeKeyDesc
data.value: Setting a key requires anyone who wants to join to enter a key in order to join.

data.name: strDefChanModeKeyParamDesc
data.value: Enter the key for this channel

data.name: strDefChanModeKeyParamName
data.value: Key

data.name: strDefChanModeModDesc
data.value: When this mode is on, only users with op, half-op, or voice may talk in the channel.

data.name: strDefChanModeNoColorDesc
data.value: This mode causes colors to be stripped

data.name: strDefChanModeNoExternMsgDesc
data.value: This mode prevents messages from being set from outside the channel. When set, users or bots must be in the channel to post.

data.name: strDefChanModeOpsModDesc
data.value: When this mode is set, all posts from anyone without voice or op privileges are sent to ops instead of the channel as a whole.

data.name: strDefChanModePrivateDesc
data.value: Private channels disable |/knock|.
data.comment: Note: The text in pipes will be formatted at runtime as fixed with. Also, don't translate text in pipes as they're always special.

data.name: strDefChanModeRegisteredUserOnlyDesc
data.value: This mode, when set, prevents users who aren't registered from joining. If you set this, be sure to set a forwarding location with 'f'.

data.name: strDefChanModeSecretDesc
data.value: If this mode is set, the channel won't be listed in |/whois| or |/list|.
data.comment: Note: The text in pipes will be formatted at runtime as fixed with. Also, don't translate text in pipes as they're always special.

data.name: strDefChanModeTopicLockDesc
data.value: This mode prevents changes to the topic by users who aren't ops or half ops. Note: Services like ChanServ or Q may prevent such topic changes even if this mode is off.

data.name: strDefUserModeInvisibleDesc
data.value: Designates this client as “invisible”.

data.name: strDefUserModeIrcOpDesc
data.value: Designates the user as a IRC operator. Use |/oper| to obtain this.
data.comment: Note: The text in pipes will be formatted at runtime as fixed with. Also, don't translate text in pipes as they're always special.

data.name: strDefUserModeMsgRestrictDesc
data.value: Prevents users not in your |/accept| list from messaging you and inviting you to channels

data.name: strDefUserModeMsgRestrictSoftDesc
data.value: Prevent users not on your |/accept| list and not in a channel with you from messaging you or inviting you to channels. This is a softer form of +g.

data.name: strDefUserModeRestrictMsgUnidentUsersDesc
data.value: Prevents unidentified users that you haven't accepted from messaging you.

data.name: strDefUserModeWallopsDesc
data.value: Can see wallops

data.name: strHasAlisFalse
data.value: False / Not Available

data.name: strHasAlisFalseToolTip
data.value: No ALIS is present on this network

data.name: strHasAlisTrue
data.value: True / Available

data.name: strHasAlisTrueToolTip
data.value: ALIS is available and ready to use.

data.name: strHasAlisUnknown
data.value: Unknown

data.name: strHasAlisUnknownToolTip
data.value: ALIS may or may not be present

data.name: strHasQFalse
data.value: False / Not Available

data.name: strHasQFalseToolTip
data.value: No Q present on this network. Q is really only QuakeNet.

data.name: strHasQTrue
data.value: True / Available

data.name: strHasQTrueToolTip
data.value: Q is present

data.name: strHasQUnknown
data.value: Unknown

data.name: strHasQUnknownToolTip
data.value: Q might or might not be present on this network

data.name: strManual
data.value: Log in manually

data.name: strNetworkInfoTypeCustom
data.value: Custom/User defined
data.comment: A network created by the user and not based on another network.

data.name: strNetworkInfoTypeCustomToolTipText
data.value: A network created by the user and not based on another network.

data.name: strNetworkInfoTypeHidden
data.value: Hidden
data.comment: A network provided by Best Chat, but the user has chosen to hide the network from views

data.name: strNetworkInfoTypeHiddenToolTipText
data.value: A network provided by Best Chat, but the user has chosen to hide the network from views

data.name: strNetworkInfoTypeModified
data.value: Modified
data.comment: A network whose information was originally provided by Best Chat, but the user has made changes.

data.name: strNetworkInfoTypeModifiedToolTipText
data.value: A network whose information was originally provided by Best Chat, but the user has made changes.

data.name: strNetworkInfoTypePredefined
data.value: Predefined
data.comment: A network whose information is provided by Best Chat and hasn't been changed.

data.name: strNetworkInfoTypePredefinedToolTipText
data.value: A network whose information is provided by Best Chat and hasn't been changed.

data.name: strNickServ
data.value: Attempt to use NickServ (Requires a network that provides NickServ)

data.name: strNickServOptAtTheme
data.value: AtTheme

data.name: strNickServOptAtThemeToolTip
data.value: NickServ is implemented by AtTheme. Only select this if you're sure that's what they use.

data.name: strNickServOptNull
data.value: None available

data.name: strNickServOptNullToolTip
data.value: Select this if the network doesn't have NickServ

data.name: strNickServOptUnknown
data.value: Available, but type unknown

data.name: strNickServOptUnknownToolTip
data.value: Select this if the network has a NickServ, but you don't know much about it

data.name: strSASL
data.value: Use SASL

data.name: strThreeWayModeStateForcedOff
data.value: ChanServ is preventing this mode from being set.

data.name: strThreeWayModeStateLockedOnDesc
data.value: ChanServ is ensuring this mode is set

data.name: strThreeWayModeStateNoPrefDesc
data.value: ChanServ isn't controlling this mode
